mapper.sql: id, orderNo, orderStatus, userId, expertId, channel, serverContent, serverType, serverAddress, serverPrice, contactPerson, contactPhone, contactQq, expectBeginDate, expectEndDate, createDate, questionDesc, meetingAddress
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_expert_reservation_order ( orderNo, orderStatus, userId, expertId, channel, serverContent, serverType, serverAddress, serverPrice, contactPerson, contactPhone, contactQq, expectBeginDate, expectEndDate, createDate, questionDesc, meetingAddress ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{orderStatus}, #{userId}, #{expertId}, #{channel}, #{serverContent}, #{serverType}, #{serverAddress}, #{serverPrice}, #{contactPerson}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactQq}, #{expectBeginDate}, #{expectEndDate}, #{createDate}, #{questionDesc}, #{meetingAddress} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_expert_reservation_order
orderNo = #{orderNo},
orderStatus = #{orderStatus},
userId = #{userId},
expertId = #{expertId},
channel = #{channel},
serverContent = #{serverContent},
serverType = #{serverType},
serverAddress = #{serverAddress},
serverPrice = #{serverPrice},
contactPerson = #{contactPerson},
contactPhone = #{contactPhone},
contactQq = #{contactQq},
expectBeginDate = #{expectBeginDate},
expectEndDate = #{expectEndDate},
createDate = #{createDate},
questionDesc = #{questionDesc},
meetingAddress = #{meetingAddress},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_expert_reservation_order
orderNo = #{map.orderNo},
orderStatus = #{map.orderStatus},
userId = #{map.userId},
expertId = #{map.expertId},
channel = #{map.channel},
serverContent = #{map.serverContent},
serverType = #{map.serverType},
serverAddress = #{map.serverAddress},
serverPrice = #{map.serverPrice},
contactPerson = #{map.contactPerson},
contactPhone = #{map.contactPhone},
contactQq = #{map.contactQq},
expectBeginDate = #{map.expectBeginDate},
expectEndDate = #{map.expectEndDate},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
questionDesc = #{map.questionDesc},
meetingAddress = #{map.meetingAddress},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_expert_reservation_order ( orderNo, orderStatus, userId, expertId, channel, serverContent, serverType, serverAddress, serverPrice, contactPerson, contactPhone, contactQq, expectBeginDate, expectEndDate, createDate, questionDesc, meetingAddress ) VALUES ( #{map.orderNo}, #{map.orderStatus}, #{map.userId}, #{map.expertId}, #{map.channel}, #{map.serverContent}, #{map.serverType}, #{map.serverAddress}, #{map.serverPrice}, #{map.contactPerson}, #{map.contactPhone}, #{map.contactQq}, #{map.expectBeginDate}, #{map.expectEndDate}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.questionDesc}, #{map.meetingAddress} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_expert_reservation_order
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND orderNo like CONCAT('%', #{orderNo} , '%')
AND orderStatus like CONCAT('%', #{orderStatus} , '%')
AND userId like CONCAT('%', #{userId} , '%')
AND expertId like CONCAT('%', #{expertId} , '%')
AND channel like CONCAT('%', #{channel} , '%')
AND serverContent like CONCAT('%', #{serverContent} , '%')
AND serverType like CONCAT('%', #{serverType} , '%')
AND serverAddress like CONCAT('%', #{serverAddress} , '%')
AND serverPrice like CONCAT('%', #{serverPrice} , '%')
AND contactPerson like CONCAT('%', #{contactPerson} , '%')
AND contactPhone like CONCAT('%', #{contactPhone} , '%')
AND contactQq like CONCAT('%', #{contactQq} , '%')
AND expectBeginDate like CONCAT('%', #{expectBeginDate} , '%')
AND expectEndDate like CONCAT('%', #{expectEndDate} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND questionDesc like CONCAT('%', #{questionDesc} , '%')
AND meetingAddress like CONCAT('%', #{meetingAddress} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
